mapper.select: SELECT a.*,c.payName as spayName ,b.identity as sidentity ,b.phone as sphone,b.rent as srent,b.urgencyPhone as surgencyPhone,b.yajin as syajin FROM mayrenter a LEFT JOIN mayrenter2 b ON a.RenterId=b.rids LEFT JOIN maypay c ON a.mayId=c.pid where a.rid =#{value}

select * from mayrenter where 1=1
and renterName like '%${renterName}%'
